caption.center: Excell OWENS a/k/a "Toe" v. STATE of Mississippi.

opinion.posture: Appeal from Circuit Court, Harrison County; Kosta N. Vlahos, J.
opinion.attorneys:
Carol L. Henderson, Gulfport, for appellant.
Bill Allain, Atty. Gen. by Robert D. Findley, Sp. Asst. Atty. Gen., Jackson, for appellee.
opinion.panel: Before BROOM, P.J., and ROY NOBLE LEE and DAN M. LEE, JJ.
